verses.roman:
satvare āsiyā teṅha mililā prabhure
prabhura ānanda haila pāñā tāṅhāre

synonyms: satvare—very soon; āsiyā—coming; teṅha—he; mililā—met; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ānanda—happiness; haila—was; pāñā—getting; tāṅhāre—him.
translation: Paramānanda Purī very soon arrived at Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's place. The Lord was very happy to see him.
